name: 18titans
summary: 18Titans game - Robin is the leader of the Teen Titans. He was abducted by Slade, who is one of the most dangerous enemies in the game. Slade takes a syringe and injects something into Robin's veins that have followed by a cryptic message. The teen superheroes find themselves in a difficult situation where they must save themselves if they hope to rescue society from Slade and his band of evildoers. It all begins with the abduction, but it doesn't have to end with the injection that very well could put an end to Robin's life.
